response.overview: In a hospital on the outskirts of 1920s Los Angeles, an injured stuntman begins to tell a fellow patient, a little girl with a broken arm, a fantastic story about 5 mythical heroes. Thanks to his fractured state of mind and her vivid imagination, the line between fiction and reality starts to blur as the tale advances.
response.title: The Fall

titles.title: The Fall - Im Reich der Fantasie
The Fall - Im Reich der Phantasie
